attributes.action: Free education resources for all students on Free School Meals
attributes.additional_details:
We urge you to take action over the current inequality in our education system for those students on Free School Meals. On average these students are two GCSE grades lower than students not on Free School Meals and we believe that this needs to change.

By signing our petition you are helping to make these views known to the Government.

We want the Government to change current policy and make all school resources free to students on Free School Meals, including includes trips, school uniform and equipment.
